page.title: 03FLOW LABORATORIES
page.content: Situated in a small industrial estate on the eastern side of the D-Block. An American company which came to Irvine 14 years ago and presently employs 110 people. {Product-}a red liquid making tissue grow,relevant equipment. {Salary-}a school leaver earns a yearly salary of Â£4800. {Customers-}hospitals,universities, research laboratories . Exports to Europe,the Middle East,Iron Curtain Countries and Japan. {Benefits-}4 company cars,pension scheme,subsidised canteen ( but no union.) {Reasons for coming to Irvine-} President likes Scotland,needed an English speaking base , near Prestwick Airport,development grants. {Future-}slow expansion.Only 4 or 5 new employees.
